item.title: Rename a Database in SQL Server
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Step-by-step guide to rename a database in SQL Server including modifying file paths, logical names, and physical files. Complete process with ALTER DATABASE commands and file management.
